snippet: The group Action Against Hunger accused Sri Lankan security forces of executing 17 of its employees during the country’s civil war, and said the government had protected the killers.
abstract: French aid group Action Against Hunger accuses Sri Lankan security forces of executing 17 of its employees in 2006 during the country's civil war, and says the government has protected the killers.
lead_paragraph: The group Action Against Hunger accused Sri Lankan security forces of executing 17 of its employees during the country’s civil war, and said the government had protected the killers.

headline.main: Sri Lanka: French Aid Group Accuses Security Forces of 2006 Massacre
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka: French Aid Group Accuses Security Forces of 2006 Massacre
